title: Mirror, mirror upon the wall, which is the Truest Sans Serif Italic of all?
content:
"Mirror, mirror upon the wall, which is the Truest Sans Serif Italic of all?"

The mirror answered –

"Thou ‘\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_’, O Sans Serif Italic, art the fairest of them all."

And... What about the 'Truest Geometric Sans Serif Italic' of all?'
author: omega

comments.content: Truest or fairest? And what would define "truest"?
I know, but you before I can answer you first have to tell me which 3 sans serif Q's have the best fairy tail.
